definition: to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: A 10-day display and sales exhibition of goods for children opened yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 为期10天的儿童用品展销会于昨天开始。

sentences.english: Representing the company at trade fairs and exhibitions .
sentences.chinese: 代表公司参加贸易展销会和展览会。

sentences.english: All the exhibits here are for sale new products.
sentences.chinese: 这里展销的尽是新产品。

sentences.english: My friends and I manned the booth at the fair.
sentences.chinese: 我和朋友在照应展销会上的这个摊点。

sentences.english: Our exhiBition centre provides sites free of rent for exhiBition and sale of products.
sentences.chinese: 本展览中心提供展销场地，不收场地租借费。

sentences.english: The fruits sales exhiBition opens up a gorgeous world Before the customers.
sentences.chinese: 水果展销会，把一个色彩斑谰的世界呈现在顾客面前。

sentences.english: US producers also are a big part of the Fancy Food Show.
sentences.chinese: 美国厂家也是这次特色食品展销会的主要参展商。

sentences.english: Chinese city holds trade fair in Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 广东省中山市在越南举办产品展销会。

sentences.english: All woollen sweaters in this cardigan show are famous Brands, and no. defective goods.
sentences.chinese: 本店羊毛衫展销，全为名牌，绝无次品。

sentences.english: The local chamber of commerce provides some financial support for showing instruments at fairs and exhibitions.
sentences.chinese: 当地商会对器乐展销会和展览会提供经济赞助。

sentences.english: Over 12 thousand visitors attended the trade fair this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年，一万两千多名游客参观了我们的贸易展销会。

sentences.english: Exhibition Hall is the structural system of large-span special- shaped vacuum steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 展销厅为大跨度异型空钢管桁架结构体系。

sentences.english: A 10-day display and sale opened yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 为期10天的展销会于昨天开始。

sentences.english: Clothing Street is the abbreviation for Tianjin Clothing Exhibit Center.
sentences.chinese: 服装街是天津市服装展销中心的简称。

sentences.english: She picked up a valuable first edition at a village book sale.
sentences.chinese: 她在墟落图书展销会上买到一本贵重的首版书。

sentences.english: At the chinaware fair, various Bright and lustrous porcelain articles are dazzling.
sentences.chinese: 瓷器展销会上，色泽鲜明的各种瓷器用品，十分耀眼。

definition: to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area
excellent quality/outstanding (product)/abbr. for 名牌優質|名牌优质/(old) famous actor or actress
